mapper.select: select TRAINING_ID, COURSE_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as time, LOCATION, TEACHER, URL, STATUS from t_training where NOW() < date_sub(TIME,interval 1 day) AND TRAINING_ID in (select TRAINING_ID FROM t_capability_training where CAPABILITY_ID = #{capabilityId}) AND TRAINING_ID NOT IN (select TRAINING_ID FROM t_personal_training WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId});
